column4: Inbound Richmond Rd at Yorkshire Blvd
column5: Vehicles in the intersection.  Roadway down to one lane.

column4: The parkway is shutdown in both directions about 2 miles east of I-64 due to three collisions in the area.
The NWS has issued a Winter Weather Advisory effective until December 5 at 10 am.
Use added caution, slow down, and increase following distances.
